description: A relative of bananas, plantain is not eaten raw but instead used in cooking like a vegetable.  It becomes sweet once it turns yellow.
A sandy and sweet fruit with pink flesh, great for milkshakes.
A sweet and acidic fruit originated from South America, grows on vines and is filled with seeds like a pomegranate.
An acidic fruit found in South America and the Caribbean, it looks like a hairy tomato and is used mainly for juice and desserts.
